description.narrative: Mainstreaming Global Environmental Priorities into National Policies and Programmes

title.narrative: Palau CB2CCCD Project AWP 2015_revised_GoPAug 2015 UNDP endorsed
Palau CB2CCD Project AWP 2015_revised_UNDP cover letter

description.narrative: The project objective is to strengthen Palau's capacities to meet national and global environmental commitments to the three Rio Conventions through improved management of environmental data and information.

1.1: Extent on which Adequate national standards, norms, procedures for collecting and storing environmental data are officially in place. 9scale: 1-Inadequate; 2- Partial; 3- Largely) 1.2: Extent on which An environmental data repository architecture in place. (scale: 1-Inadequate; 2- Partial; 3- Largely) 1.3: Extent on which information technologies in place to collect, store and share giving access to up-to-date environmental information. (scale: 1-Inadequate; 2- Partial; 3- Largely) 1.4: Extent on which agreements for data sharing in place. (scale: 1-Inadequate; 2- Partial; 3- Largely) 2.1: Extent on which an in-service training programme for public servants include course(s) covering environmental information management.(scale: 1-Inadequate; 2- Partial; 3- Largely) 2.2: Number of Environmental Officers trained by taking the course(s) developed with the support of the project. 2.3: Extent on which Use up-to-date environmental information in decision-making and policy-making. (scale: 1-Inadequate; 2- Partial; 3- Largely) 3.1: Extent on which an operational inter-sectorial coordination mechanism that build on existing instruments such as OERC, NEPC, PNRC, NPC, etc. (scale: 1-Inadequate; 2- Partial; 3- Largely) 3.2: Extent on which the action plans for implementing MEAs supporting government's MEA obligations is endorsed. (scale: 1-Inadequate; 2- Partial; 3- Largely)

title.narrative: Palau Local Goverance Strengthening Project Document
PW LG State Gov Capacity Bldg

description.narrative: 4 States in Palau (Executive and Legislative branches) have enhanced capacities to plan and manage public resources to deliver basic services to their constituencies

activity-description.narrative: Strengthening capabilities of State governors, legislators and staff on their roles, functions and duties

description.narrative: Output 2: The Ministry of State (Bureau of Domestic Affairs) has enhanced capacities to support State governments and facilitates relations and operations between central administrations, the Senate, the House of Delegates and State governments.

activity-description.narrative: Capacities strengthened at national government to support State Government, including facilitation of better relations between different arms of Government.

description.narrative: 1. Percentage of recommendations (through reviews and studies undertaken) incorporated into state government plans (aiming to increase capacity of the Bureau of State to provide better services and engage more effectively with State Governments and other national government ministries).

Output 3: Local residents from 4 States, including youth and women, have increased understanding of central and local governments roles and responsibilities and participate more actively in local decision making and oversight.

activity-description.narrative: Increase understanding of citizens on roles and responsibilities of central and local governments and participate in local decision making and oversight

description.narrative:
1. Proportion of population (disaggregated by gender) have been reached within the 4 supported States
2. Percentage of targeted population of (75%) reporting increased engagement and knowledge on State Government roles, functions and local laws.
